statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={185.6}{e}^{{{0.0328}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0328}}\approx{1.0333438498031}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0333438498031}-{1}={0.03334384980309}\approx{0.0333} and the percent is 3.33.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
